00038 class TileFeatureArg {
00039 public:
00040 
00041    enum tileFeatureArg_t {
00043       simpleArg = 0,
00045       coordArg  = 1,
00047       coordsArg = 2,
00049       stringArg = 3
00050    };
00051    
00052    TileFeatureArg( TileArgNames::tileArgName_t name ) : m_name( name ) {
00053    }
00054 
00056    inline static const SimpleArg* simpleArgCast(
00057                                  const TileFeatureArg* probSimple);
00058    
00060    inline static const StringArg* stringArgCast(
00061                                  const TileFeatureArg* probString);
00062 
00064    inline static const CoordsArg* coordsArgCast(
00065                                  const TileFeatureArg* probCoords);
00066    
00067    
00068    virtual ~TileFeatureArg() {}
00069

00071

00081                          const TileMap& tileMap,
00082                          const TileFeatureArg* prevArg ) const = 0;
00083 #endif

00095                          TileMap& tileMap, 
00096                          const TileFeatureArg* prevArg ) = 0;

00130 class SimpleArg : public TileFeatureArg {

00139          TileFeatureArg( argName ), m_size( nbrBits ) {
00140 #ifdef MC2_SYSTEM

00142 #endif            
00143          }

00329 class CoordsArg : public TileFeatureArg

00337               TileArgNames::tileArgName_t argName ) :
00338       TileFeatureArg( argName ), m_allCoords(allCoords) {
00339       // Means that it should be updated at addCoord.

00512 // --- Implementation of inlined methods ---
00513 
00514 inline const SimpleArg*
00515 TileFeatureArg::simpleArgCast(const TileFeatureArg* probSimple)
00516 {
00517    if ( ( probSimple != NULL ) &&
00518         ( probSimple->getArgType() == simpleArg ) ) {
00519       return static_cast<const SimpleArg*>(probSimple);
00520    } else {
00521       return NULL;
00522    }
00523 }
00524 
00525 inline const StringArg*
00526 TileFeatureArg::stringArgCast(const TileFeatureArg* probString)
00527 {
00528    if ( ( probString != NULL ) &&
00529         ( probString->getArgType() == stringArg ) ) {
00530       return static_cast<const StringArg*>(probString);
00531    } else {
00532       return NULL;
00533    }
00534 }
00535 
00536 inline const CoordsArg*
00537 TileFeatureArg::coordsArgCast(const TileFeatureArg* probCoords)
00538 {
00539    if ( ( probCoords != NULL ) &&
00540         ( probCoords->getArgType() == coordsArg ) ) {
00541       return static_cast<const CoordsArg*>(probCoords);
00542    } else {
00543       return NULL;
00544    }
00545 }

00549 TileFeatureArg::getName() const
00550 {
00551    return m_name;

00554 inline byte 
00555 SimpleArg::getSize() const
00556 {
00557    return m_size;

00560 
00561 inline TileMapCoords::iterator 
00562 CoordsArg::begin() 
00563 {
00564    return m_allCoords->begin() + m_startCoordIdx;
00565 }
00566 
00567 inline TileMapCoords::iterator 
00568 CoordsArg::end() 
00569 {
00570    return m_allCoords->begin() + m_endCoordIdx;
00571 }
00572 
00573 
00574 inline TileMapCoords::const_iterator 
00575 CoordsArg::begin() const 
00576 {
00577    return m_allCoords->begin() + m_startCoordIdx;
00578 }
00579 
00580 inline TileMapCoords::const_iterator 
00581 CoordsArg::end() const 
00582 {
00583    return m_allCoords->begin() + m_endCoordIdx;
00584 }
00585 
00586 inline const TileMapCoord& 
00587 CoordsArg::front() const
00588 {
00589    return *begin();
00590 }
00591 
00592 inline const TileMapCoord& 
00593 CoordsArg::back() const
00594 {
00595    const_iterator endIt = end();
00596    return *(--endIt);
00597 }
00598 
00599 inline int 
00600 CoordsArg::size() const 
00601 {
00602    return m_endCoordIdx - m_startCoordIdx;
00603 }
00604 
00605 inline const MC2BoundingBox&
00606 CoordsArg::getBBox() const
00607 {
00608    return m_bbox;
00609 }
